subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In deals for shortstop Troy Tulowitzki, pitcher David Price and others, the Jays acquired, almost overnight, the parts they thought they needed to end a 21-year playoff drought.
snippet: In deals for shortstop Troy Tulowitzki, pitcher David Price and others, the Jays acquired, almost overnight, the parts they thought they needed to end a 21-year playoff drought.
